Text: But when he turned 65 and enrolled in Medicare, the price of the drug skyrocketed to $2,400 for a 30-day supply.
Cause: But when he turned 65 and enrolled in Medicare
Effect: the price of the drug skyrocketed to $2,400 for a 30-day supply.
Sentence: <e1>But when he turned 65 and enrolled in Medicare</e1>, <e2>the price of the drug skyrocketed to $2,400 for a 30-day supply.</e2>
